title: Bloomberg Markets: Bentley's Case for Place-Based Education
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bentley's Case for Place-Based Education
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010Gloria Larson\u0010President\u0010Bentley University\u0010Discussing "The case for place-based education: why being on a campus matters for future leaders" with Andrew Shepardson, Dean of Students at Bentley. Bentley University is a strategic partner of Bloomberg Radio. \u0010\u0010Julie Delongchamp\u0010ESG Research Associate\u0010Wellington Management\u0010Discussing how being on a campus had a lasting impact on her growth educational growth.\u0010\u0010Kevin Kruger\u0010President\u0010NASPA\u0010Discussing how graduates are taking their campus experiences with them and thriving in the workplace.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
